item.title: Presenter (Level 4)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Blacksmith (Level 4)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 5)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Used git cherry-pick to add a sha from another branch into the current branch.

item.title: Traveler (Level 6)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 3)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 3)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 8)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 3)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 7)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 2)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 2)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 1)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Historian (Level 4)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Librarian
item.description: Looked for change that introduce or remove a string with git log -S

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Baptised
item.description: Set global user name using git config.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 1)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.
